trans-unit.source: Defines methods for writing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> parts to an XPS document.
trans-unit.target: Define métodos para gravar partes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> em um documento XPS.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage%2A> method to obtain a fixed-page writer for adding pages to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage%2A> método para obter um gravador de página fixa para a adição de páginas para um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> à página atual.

trans-unit.source: The new color context resource that was added.
trans-unit.target: O novo recurso de contexto de cor que foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddColorContext%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddColorContext%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext> para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> à página atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> à página atual.

trans-unit.source: The new font resource that was added.
trans-unit.target: O novo recurso de fonte que foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> method to add a font resource to a page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> para adicionar um recurso de fonte para uma página.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to obfuscate the font; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para ofuscar da fonte; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new obfuscated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> ofuscado à página atual.

trans-unit.source: The new font resource that was added.
trans-unit.target: O novo recurso de fonte que foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> with optional obfuscation to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> com ofuscação opcional para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font.
trans-unit.target: Definir o `obfuscate` parâmetro `true` quando estiver legalmente obrigados a ofuscar uma fonte de proprietária licenciada.

trans-unit.source: While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o obscurecimento não criptografa a fonte, ele inibe descompactar proprietárias fontes e instalá-los separadamente para outros usos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a ofuscação de fonte, consulte a seção 2.1.7.3 "Ofuscação de fonte incorporada" no *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* disponível para download em [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> method in order to add a font resource to a page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> método para adicionar um recurso de fonte para uma página.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to obfuscate the font; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para ofuscar da fonte; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to prevent modification of any text that uses the font; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para impedir a modificação de qualquer texto que use a fonte; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new obfuscated or restricted <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> ocultado ou restrito à página atual.

trans-unit.source: The new font resource that was added.
trans-unit.target: O novo recurso de fonte que foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> with optional obfuscation or restrictions to the document package, and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> com ofuscação opcional ou restrições para o pacote de documento e o associa ao atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font.
trans-unit.target: Definir o `obfuscate` parâmetro `true` quando estiver legalmente obrigados a ofuscar uma fonte de proprietária licenciada.

trans-unit.source: While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o obscurecimento não criptografa a fonte, ele inibe descompactar proprietárias fontes e instalá-los separadamente para outros usos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about font obfuscation and the use of restricted fonts see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o obscurecimento de fonte e o uso de fontes restritas, consulte o *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* disponível para download em [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> method to add a font resource to a page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> para adicionar um recurso de fonte para uma página.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> à página atual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the image to add.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] da imagem a adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> com um tipo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] determinado à página atual.

trans-unit.source: The new image resource that was added to the page
trans-unit.target: O novo recurso de imagem adicionado à página

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> with a specified `mimeType` to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> com determinado `mimeType` para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> method to add an image resource to a page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> para adicionar um recurso de imagem para uma página.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mimeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mimeType" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mimeType" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mimeType" /> é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: The type of image to add to the page.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de imagem a adicionar à página.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> com um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType" /> determinado à página atual.

trans-unit.source: The new image resource that was added to the page
trans-unit.target: O novo recurso de imagem adicionado à página

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> com especificado <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: For example, `imageType` can be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `imageType` pode ser <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

trans-unit.source: to add a JPEG or PNG <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um JPEG ou PNG <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage>, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> method to add an image resource to a page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> para adicionar um recurso de imagem para uma página.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: The type of resource to add.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de recurso a adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the resource to add, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O caminho absoluto do recurso ao qual adicionar ou <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource" /> à página atual.

trans-unit.source: The new [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] resource that was added.
trans-unit.target: O novo recurso [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] que foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddResource%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> to the document package, and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddResource%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> para o pacote de documento e o associa ao atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: If `resourceUri` is `null`, a unique resource <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Uri%2A> is automatically created.
trans-unit.target: Se `resourceUri` é `null`, um recurso exclusivo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Uri%2A> é criado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="resourceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="resourceType" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="resourceType" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="resourceType" /> é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> to the page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> à página.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> that was added to the page.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> adicionado à página.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddResourceDictionary%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddResourceDictionary%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary> para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: The image type of the thumbnail image to add to the page.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de imagem da imagem em miniatura a adicionar à página.

trans-unit.source: Adds a thumbnail image of a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType" /> to the current page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma imagem em miniatura de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType" /> especificado à página atual.

trans-unit.source: The new thumbnail image resource that was added.
trans-unit.target: O novo recurso de imagem em miniatura que foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A> Adiciona um novo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> para o pacote de documento e a associa atual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.

trans-unit.source: For example, `imageType` can be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `imageType` pode ser <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

trans-unit.source: to add a JPEG or PNG thumbnail image, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar uma imagem em miniatura JPEG ou PNG, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> has already been called to add an image thumbnail for this page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> já foi chamado para adicionar uma miniatura da imagem a essa página.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> has been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: Each page can only contain with one thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Cada página pode conter apenas com uma miniatura.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> is called to add more than one thumbnail image for the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> é gerada se <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> é chamado para adicionar mais de uma imagem em miniatura para a página.

trans-unit.source: Flushes and closes the fixed-page writer.
trans-unit.target: Libera e fecha o gravador de página fixa.

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A> method may be delayed until the complete <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Com base nas configurações de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, a operação de liberação do <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A> método pode ser atrasado até a conclusão <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to flush and close the fixed-page writer with the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como liberar e fechar o gravador de página fixa com o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of strings that identify the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> hyperlink points that are contained in the current page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de cadeias de caracteres que identificam os pontos de hiperlink <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> contidos na página atual.

trans-unit.source: A list of strings that identify the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> hyperlink points that are contained in the page.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de cadeias de caracteres que identificam o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> pontos de hiperlink que estão contidos na página.

trans-unit.source: The list of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> hyperlink points is available after the page has been written and the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: A lista de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> pontos hiperlink está disponível depois que a página foi gravada e o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A> método foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> elements see Section 3.2.3 "\<LinkTarget> Element" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> elementos consulte a seção 3.2.3 "\<LinkTarget > elemento" no *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* disponível para download em [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based page number of this page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número da página de base zero dessa página.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of this page.
trans-unit.target: O número da página de base zero dessa página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.PageNumber%2A> property returns the zero-based page number for this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> of the document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.PageNumber%2A> propriedade retorna o número da página com base em zero para este <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> do documento.

trans-unit.source: (<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.PageNumber%2A> value of zero is the first page.)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.PageNumber%2A> valor zero é a primeira página.)

trans-unit.source: Sets the default printing options for the page.
trans-unit.target: Define as opções de impressão padrão para a página.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da página fixa.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] da página fixa.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for writing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] markup to the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> para a gravação de marcação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] para a página.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for writing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] markup to the page.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> para gravação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] marcação para a página.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.XmlWriter%2A> method to obtain an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.XmlWriter%2A> método para obter um <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
